name: Unidentified_Trandoshan_(Lessa-7)
content: A Trandoshan was the leader of a group of Trandoshans who took over a facility on the moon Lessa-7. The facility was formerly owned by Wookiees who used chemicals from the stomach of a sarlacc to produce medicine, but the Trandoshans enslaved the Wookiees, using the facility to create chemical weapons. The smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca met with the Trandoshans on Lessa-7 to purchase corrosive charges for Jabba the Hutt, but Chewbacca, a Wookiee, discovered the situation of his brethren and set out to free them. The Trandoshan confronted Chewbacca above the pit where the sarlacc was held, and during their ensuing brawl, attempted to throw themself and the Wookiee into the pit. Solo, however, saved Chewbacca, leaving the Trandoshan to fall into the sarlacc.
